outputPath.description: The output path of the Forge app files.

environment.description: Specify the environment (see your default environment by running 'forge settings list')

debug.description: Run Forge tunnel in debug mode.

debugFunctionHandlers.description: List of function handlers declared on manifest to debug, separated by space. This option must be specified if debug mode is enabled. It is only used for Node runtime debugger.

debugStartingPort.description: Starting port to use for debugging, multiple handlers will get subsequent ports. It is only used for Node runtime debugger (default: 9229)

verbose.description: Run Forge tunnel in verbose mode.

preTunnelTimeout.description: Max milliseconds to wait for tunnel preparation tasks.
